subject: Order: SSN4378
description_text:
Good afternoon!

I ordered these pedals as a present, but was just informed someone else had
already gifted him pedals. Is there any way this order can be canceled as
it hasn’t been shipped yet? What would be the process and will I be able to
get a full refund for the product?

Thank you! Happy Holidays.
Ashley

conversations.body_text:
> Good afternoon!
>
> I ordered these pedals as a present, but was just informed someone else
> had already gifted him pedals. Is there any way this order can be canceled
> as it hasn’t been shipped yet? What would be the process and will I be able
> to get a full refund for the product?
>
> Thank you! Happy Holidays.
> Ashley
>
>
Hi ashley porter,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your package has already been shipped, and we are unable to cancel it for you. We're sorry.
